name: world-builder
description: An app enabling you to build rich stories, worlds and timelines

scripts.build-js: cd app && dir *.ts /b /s > ts-files.txt && cd .. && tsc @app/ts-files.txt && trash app/ts-files.txt && concat-glob-cli -f "app/{app.js,!(components)/**/*.js}" -o app/app.tmp.js && minify app/app.tmp.js -o app/app.min.js
scripts.build-css: lessc app/app.less app/app.tmp.css && minify app/app.tmp.css -o app/app.min.css
scripts.build: npm run build-js && npm run build-css
